description: Try our easy to follow Osso Buco With Basil Pesto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Osso bucco,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Winter,Low sugar,Beef,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Slow cooked
name: Osso Buco With Basil Pesto Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pat osso buco dry with paper towel, brush with oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Brown beef on both sides in a large ovenproof casserole dish over medium-high heat.
Add stock, onion, carrot, and bouquet garni, bring to the boil and reduce heat to a simmer. Cover and cook for 1 1/4 hrs or until beef is tender.
Add the green beans and cannellini beans for the last 15 minutes of cooking.
Divide vegetables and sauce between 4 bowls and top each with a piece of osso buco and a dollop of pesto.
